languages.text: "Роно и Люми оттачивают мастерство каждую свободную минуту. Право, упорство передается по наследству".

traits.locale_text: "Роно и Люми оттачивают мастерство каждую свободную минуту. Право, упорство передается по наследству".

languages.text: "Rono and Lumi spend their every spare moment practising. Diligence truly does run in the family, it seems."
languages.original_text: "Роно и Люми оттачивают мастерство каждую свободную минуту. Право, упорство передается по наследству".

traits.locale_text: "Rono and Lumi spend their every spare moment practising. Diligence truly does run in the family, it seems."

languages.text: «Rono y Lumi dedican todo momento libre a practicar. Llevan la diligencia en la sangre».
languages.original_text: "Rono and Lumi spend their every spare moment practising. Diligence truly does run in the family, it seems."

traits.locale_text: «Rono y Lumi dedican todo momento libre a practicar. Llevan la diligencia en la sangre».

languages.text: 「ロノとルミは全ての時間を訓練に使っています。勤勉さは彼らの家系の特徴でしょうね」
languages.original_text: "Rono and Lumi spend their every spare moment practising. Diligence truly does run in the family, it seems."

traits.locale_text: 「ロノとルミは全ての時間を訓練に使っています。勤勉さは彼らの家系の特徴でしょうね」

languages.text: “罗诺和露米会利用一切空闲时间练习技艺。看来，勤勉确实是我们家族遗传的优点。”
languages.original_text: "Rono and Lumi spend their every spare moment practising. Diligence truly does run in the family, it seems."

traits.locale_text: “罗诺和露米会利用一切空闲时间练习技艺。看来，勤勉确实是我们家族遗传的优点。”

languages.text: "Rono und Lumi haben jeden freien Augenblick geprobt. Fleiß scheint hier wirklich eine Familieneigenschaft zu sein."
languages.original_text: "Rono and Lumi spend their every spare moment practising. Diligence truly does run in the family, it seems."

traits.locale_text: "Rono und Lumi haben jeden freien Augenblick geprobt. Fleiß scheint hier wirklich eine Familieneigenschaft zu sein."

languages.text: « Rono et Lumi passent tout leur temps libre à s'entraîner. Comme quoi, bon sang ne saurait mentir. »
languages.original_text: "Rono and Lumi spend their every spare moment practising. Diligence truly does run in the family, it seems."

traits.locale_text: « Rono et Lumi passent tout leur temps libre à s'entraîner. Comme quoi, bon sang ne saurait mentir. »

languages.text: "Rono ve Lumi, tüm boş vakitlerini pratikle geçiriyor. Çalışkanlık, demek ki hakikaten aileden geliyor."
languages.original_text: "Rono and Lumi spend their every spare moment practising. Diligence truly does run in the family, it seems."
